title: Are You There God? It's Me, Margaret
short_cast: Abby Ryder Fortson, Rachel McAdams, Kathy Bates, Benny Safdie, Elle Graham, Amari Alexis Price, Katherine Mallen Kupferer, Kate MacCluggage, Aidan Wojtak-Hissong, Landon S. Baxter

desc: In the 1970s, 11-year-old Margaret navigates new friendships, family life, questions of faith — and the agony of waiting for puberty to finally arrive.
